# Perte de precision quand on bruite les coordonn√©es
```{r}
exp <- long_tess3_noisyCoord(ns = c(200),
                                  nsites.neutral = c(1.5 * 1e4),
                                  m.neutral =  c(0.25 * 0.05 * 1e-6,
                                                 0.25 * 1 * 1e-6,
                                                 0.25 * 1.5 * 1e-6,
                                                 0.25 * 2.5 * 1e-6,
                                                 0.25 * 5 * 1e-6),
                                  noise.signal = c(0.0, 1.0, 2.0, 3.0),
                                  nb.rep = 5,
                                  compute.vario = FALSE,
                                  cluster.nb = NULL,
                                  save = FALSE, bypass = TRUE)
plot_tess3_noisyCoord(exp)
```

# Le garde fou : le variogram

```{r}
exp <- long_tess3_noisyCoord(n = 200,
                             cluster.nb = NULL,
                             nb.rep = 1,
                             noise.signal = c(0.0, 1.0, 3.0),
                             compute.vario = TRUE,
                             save = FALSE, bypass = TRUE)
plot_tess3_noisyCoord(exp)
```
